DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , multi-center study compare efficacy safety XRP9881 plus cisplatin gemcitabine plus cisplatin first line treatment locally advanced/metastatic urothelial tract bladder cancer . The primary objective compare overall survival . Secondary objective include comparison progression free survival , objective response rate , time definitive deterioration performance status , duration response , time definitive weight loss , assessment overall safety , pharmacokinetics . Patients treated disease progression , death , unacceptable toxicity followed-up death end study whichever come first .
